stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
MyShopping.com.au is Australia's premier comparison shopping service. They collect information on products and prices from thousands of online stores. All these data are provided in a single convenient and easy to use search engine that helps visitors find the right product at the right price from millions of goods on offer.
This service is to setup the tracking code and provide data to their online reports that your can access through the merchant login.

Sales Tracking

Virtual Sales Tracking is a feature that allows merchants to track actual sales from visitors brought to your e-commerce site by the Myshopping Comparison Shopping Engine.

When a purchase is finalised and the shopper reaches your Thank You page a record of that successful sale is sent. The date of the sale the order number and the total amount are available via online reports.

What can I expect?

  • Add myshopping.com.au Sales Tracking code to website
title: MyShopping.com.au Tracker Setup
